title: 'Good shampoo'
body: I tried this shampoo as an experiment because I read good reviews about it. After using it for over a month, This time I bought the bigger bottle. Must say the shampoo does it's job well. It makes the hair soft and shiny after use and leaves a really nice smell. It has also helped to control my hair fall. I have tried many professional shampoos but this is good. It's not natural though but doesn't harm the hair either. So go for it..but test if it suits your hair
